data.title: Leave a gift in your Will for Sheffield Children's
data.meta_description:
Leaving a gift in your Will changes the lives of hundreds of thousands of children who are treated at Sheffield Children's every year. 

Find out how you can leave a gift and create a discounted Will with Irwin Mitchell.
data.text:
If you decide to use our partner solicitors Irwin Mitchell, they are offering a discounted Will writing fee together with a donation made to our charity for each Will written.

Standard Single Will: £175 discounted to £100 with 20%, (£20) given of that fee to The Children’s Hospital Charity

Standard Mirror Wills for couples: £260 discounted to £190 with 20%, (£38) given out of that fee to The Children’s Hospital Charity

There are two ways you can leave a gift to The Children’s Hospital Charity in your Will:

A SHARE OF YOUR ESTATE, this is the most valuable way to give to charity and is known as a ‘residuary gift’

A GIFT OF MONEY, you can leave a specific amount to us which is known as a ‘pecuniary gift’

We understand that leaving a gift is a special and personal decision and we make this promise to you so you know your donation will be well cared for:

* We understand and agree that your family and friends come first, and promise to treat you and your family with courtesy, sensitivity and respect

* We will always be happy to answer any questions you may have, such as how your gift will make a difference to children’s lives

* We will use your gift wisely ensuring that the hundreds of thousands of children and their families who visit our hospital will benefit from your donation.

* You can change your mind about leaving a legacy at any time.

* We will always respect your privacy.
